LISA GB configuration¶

Manage galactic binaries sources

class LISA_GB_configuration.LISA_GB_source(name_, params_)¶

Define a source for a galactic binary

display()¶

Print name and parametrization of the source

get_name()¶

Return name of the source

get_source_parameters()¶

Return parameters of the source

get_source_position()¶

Return position of the source

reset()¶

Reset name, parameters and sources

set_source_position(beta_, lambda_)¶

Set the position of the source

Parameters:

  • beta (float) –

  • lambda (float) –

source_init(name_, params_)¶

Init name, parameters and position of a source

Parameters:

  • name (string) – name of the source

  • params (array) – parameters of the source

FOM application
